name: web-scrapper-stdio
description: A Python-based MCP server for headless web scraping via Playwright, outputting Markdown, text, or HTML.

DEFAULT_TIMEOUT_SECONDS.description: Timeout for page loads and navigation (seconds)

DEFAULT_MIN_CONTENT_LENGTH.description: Minimum content length for extracted text (characters)

DEFAULT_MIN_CONTENT_LENGTH_SEARCH_APP.description: Minimum content length for search.app domains (characters)

DEFAULT_MIN_SECONDS_BETWEEN_REQUESTS.description: Minimum delay between requests to the same domain (seconds)

DEFAULT_TEST_NO_DELAY_THRESHOLD.description: Threshold for skipping artificial delays in tests (seconds)
